attributes.action: remove the licence fee to indivduals who are subscribing to another tv provider
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are currently customers of another TV provider such as SKY, Virgin Media etc... should have the option to not pay the licence fee to the BBC.  I suggest that the BBC create a package within the TV providers network which is an upgrade option in the same way as you would buy a sports or movie package.  They would then receive funding from the TV providers directly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
